Author: JammedHIFI
Text: My ribs already stick out and they make me look two times slimmer than I am

Author: TheBonesRTheirMoney
Text: Mine are the same!! There are ab exercises and posture exercises that help them come back in if they’re flared, but mine were both flared AND very big so it didn’t fix it 100%. I actually learned to love them because at least they’re always super visible, so it makes you look a lot thinner. When you’re standing, try to “knit in” the arched space between them, and try to engage your lower abs instead of “sucking in” with the diaphragm. Maybe we have bigger lungs? Lmfao
